Html: This is off topic, but I wonder if somebody can confirm what appears to be a documentation error in the MS-PST file format.  In the description of the pst header (2.2.2.6) the fields bidNextP and bidNextB are defined as BID structures of 64 bits, but in my examination of a real Unicode .pst file, and in the example data given in the documentation, these are in fact 32 bit values.  If you don't define them as 32 bit, the rest of the header does not parse out correctly.  How would I inform Microsoft of this error?
